module.name: Fax Configuration Professional
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. The Fax Pro module adds functionality to the standard FreePBX Fax modue. Outbound faxing can be done through a web interface on your FreePBX system. Simply type in a phone number and upload a PDF. You can optionally set the outgoing PDF to use a locally stored fax coversheet with your faxes; and type in a personal message on the coversheet
module.changelog: 2.11.26 Fixes for licensing 2.11.24 Bump Version for GUI Fix 2.11.23 Extension Page Settings Saving Issues 2.11.20 Display Issues 2.11.19 JS Issues 2.11.18 UCP Support 2.11.16 Minor Changes Zend Licensing, to avoid potential issues. 2.11.15 Fixes issue where forwarded faxes would add the prefix 2.11.14 Add email notifcation on outbound faxes 2.11.13 Add global option on retry of failed faxes 2.11.12 #7032 - Mark faxes as old when clicking on them in ARI 2.11.11 Add support for retries 2.11.10 Fix issue where localstationid wasn't set on outgoing faxes 2.11.9 Fix issue when writing out routing dialplan 2.11.8 Fix issue with sendfax dialplan not being generated 2.11.7 Fix issue where deleting a company logo will clear other values, such as max pages and excess faxes options 2.11.6 Fix spelling, depend on fax, and don't try to splice dialplan that won't be available 2.11.5 fix spelling 2.11.4 Fix issue with validation of global prefix causing prefix issue
